turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm trying to order two large pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One of them I want Mediterranean, and the other one, pesto veggie, and I want extra cheese on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, you are ordering 2 large pizzas with extra cheese, 1 mediterranean and one pesto veggie, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $50, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and, would you like pick up, delivery, or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 25 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you. No, that's it. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
